Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that neither Bruce Lee nor Warren Buffett actually made the quoted statement.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or proof to support the attribution of the quote to either Bruce Lee or Warren Buffett.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the quote must have come from either Bruce Lee or Warren Buffett, without considering alternative sources.
Exist alternative explanation: There are alternative explanations for the origin of the quote, such as it being shared without attribution or being falsely attributed to famous individuals.
Understate: There is no evidence presented to understate the claim or suggest that the quote may have originated from either Bruce Lee or Warren Buffett.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence presented to exaggerate the claim or suggest that the quote is more widely attributed to Lee or Buffett than it actually is.
Falters at times: The claim falters in its attribution of the quote to Bruce Lee and Warren Buffett, as it is not supported by reliable sources or evidence.
